data.text:
Stanley Park is the largest urban park in Vancouver, which consists of a vast forest, miles of shoreline, beautiful beaches, and best walking trails.

It’s a great place to enjoy outdoor activities and a perfect spot to find fall colors and autumn leaves🍁🍂
⠀
#KoreanAir https://t.co/l8kftmoxKb

If you can immediately recognize this badge,there is a high chance that you have watched the 1988 Seoul Olympics’ live broadcast. 📺👀
⠀
Take a look at some of the memorial goods and feel the historical traces of Korean Air!
⠀
#KoreanAir #Vintage #KE_Oldschool #Retro https://t.co/sCzN4VuX4K

Siberia’s Lake Baikal is renowned for its many titles.🥇
⠀
It’s the world’s deepest lake, world’s oldest and largest freshwater lake, and also a popular home for many indigenous species.🐟
⠀
Hope we can have the chance to visit Lake Baikal soon! ✈️
⠀
#KoreanAir #LakeBaikal https://t.co/XOpBFHe57v

data.text:
[Old School Never Dies, KE Vintage Collection 3 - Aircraft]

If you can recognize this aircraft model, then you are truly a Korean Air maniac!✈️ 

This is the Lockheed Constellation, the first aircraft which flew overseas on a Presidential visit in Korean history.🌏

#KE_Vintage https://t.co/Yf9HvFEmye

What happens if you forget to wear your mask at the airport? 

Don’t worry! We are keeping yours at the check-in counter. 

Just ask our staff and you can receive the “Care Kit”.

Find the sanitary items all exclusively prepared for you. 

#ExcellenceInSanitation #KoreanAir https://t.co/lhnpXNOd82

Listen carefully to the soothing sound of Haeinsa Temple. 

Concentrate on your inner voice, and let go of your anxiety.

Find more in Korean Air’s ___blank.

🎧https://t.co/O0T2x3VXGk

#KoreanAir #ASMR👂 #Blank https://t.co/7iNqJL49gB

Are you fall-ing for autumn these days? 🍁  

Every fall, Korean Air hosts the annual #KoreanAirTravelPhotoContest .

Although the contest is not open this year due to the current situation, we are still happy to share some beautiful, eye-catching photos of our past winners. 📷 https://t.co/sSQMeTSmq1

data.text:
Happy Halloween!😍

Stay safe at home and keep social distancing.
Decorate your home with carved pumpkins and other spooky items.

Wear your favorite costume and turn on a scary movie to experience the spine-chilling atmosphere. 

Make your Halloween sweeter and safer than ever💙 https://t.co/7yCk7wHhCu

[Old School never dies, KE Vintage collection2- TimeTable]

Can anyone recognize this “Paper Timetable” from Korean Air?

In our good old days without access to internet, Paper timetable was the first thing you had to find for booking air travel. 

#KE_Vintage https://t.co/GbDo90z232

🎧Turn up the volume before watching the video🎧

Imagine that you are walking along the pathway of Meochewat forest, the hidden healing location of Jeju island. 

Feel Korea's nature. 

Find more in Korean Air’s ___blank.

🎧https://t.co/xAE8DhUw7A 

#KoreanAir #ASMR👂 #Blank https://t.co/YVOMIHRHju

Small but deep enough to feel the medieval atmosphere of its long history. It’s packed with loads of attractive tour spots.

The view from the Kufstein fortress is a ‘must-see’👀 https://t.co/jj9uxuCEZd

data.text:
[Old School Never Dies, KE Vintage collection1 - Hwatu]

During pre-AVOD🎮era, Korean Air used to provide Hwatu, the Korean card games to our passengers to ease their long flight time✈️.

Many passengers were fascinated by the sleek, red back cover of Hwatu🎴.

#KE_Vintage https://t.co/Rqz3CK81kG

🎧Turn up the volume before watching the video🎧

Mt. Kaya is well-known for its beautiful seasonal color of autumn.

Feel the nice autumn breeze blowing through the clear blue sky.

🎧https://t.co/v6bKS1oAvb

data.text:
Our instagram follower @ doyeon1275 introduces her secret corona clean destination. 

#LakeEmeraldCanada

Can’t really tell if the view is real 😃

This beautiful scenery looks like it came out of a fairytale story 💗

#KoreanAir #koreanairtrip https://t.co/fdwcSqdabJ

[Fly Safely with Us, CARE FIRST]

🤔What do you do about the seats of passengers who have shown symptoms?
🤔Is cabin air safe and clean?

https://t.co/gH4TIdeubM

data.text:
[Picnic Time 🌻☘️]
⠀
Autumn is the best time to visit Korea, which falls between the months of September to November offering amazing weather and beautiful autumn foliage🍁🍂
⠀
The beautiful, breezy days of autumn are perfect to plan a picnic💙

#KoreanAir #FallPicnic
⠀ https://t.co/9hyPkc0XPC

🎧Turn up the volume before watching the video🎧

Baron holy Christian sites, located in Jecheon, is famous for its unique view of the Korean-style architecture of Catholic church.

Find more in Korean Air’s ___blank.

🎧https://t.co/1TloQnXCmN

#KoreanAir #ASMR #Blank https://t.co/8qnosf2mVc

Check out our safety lab agents stacking up blocks to build the Care First slogan 🙆
⠀
The whole process did take time and effort, indeed!
But, the process definitely reflects our sincere commitment to prioritizing your "safety" first 🙏
⠀
Travel safely with us 💙

#KoreanAir https://t.co/3H5GXz1wko

As we are still in the midst of the pandemic, gathering is not recommended. But, we can still make wishes to the full moon 🌕
⠀
We wish to fly again with you soon!✈️
⠀
Happy Chuseok everyone 💙
⠀
#KoreanAir #Chuseok
⠀ https://t.co/VbYeUp3Dse

data.text:
Travel safely with us! We welcome you aboard 💙
⠀
https://t.co/nbYkvgVN3k
#CareFirst #KoreanAir
⠀
* Some procedures may vary depending on airport operation policy
⠀ https://t.co/kx9YTcDg65

When you are ready to board, Keep your mask on and maintain sufficient space followed by queue stickers on the floor. Furthermore, the temperature of all passengers are measured at the gate, and passengers with a temperature higher than 37.5 degrees will be denied boarding🩸 https://t.co/i1SPi7CAdI

⠀
[Korean Air cares about your boarding procedure]
⠀
To minimize your contact with other passengers, boarding occurs according to the zone, which is subdivided and operated from the back seat of the aircraft 💺 You can check your zone number on your boarding pass.
⠀ https://t.co/3oTI6VqMRF

🎧Turn up the volume before watching the video🎧
⠀
Just relax and enjoy the serene view of Cheomseongdae observatory in Gyeongju -- the oldest surviving astronomical observatory in Asia.
⠀
Find more in Korean Air’s _blank.
⠀
🎧https://t.co/BzD5GMWce4
⠀
#KoreanAir #ASMR #Blank https://t.co/iMHex0B2Jf

Though it may be inconvenient, you will be provided individually wrapped food boxes to reduce physical touchpoints. We ask for your kind understanding 😄
⠀
https://t.co/nbYkvgVN3k
⠀
#CareFirst #KoreanAir
⠀
* Some procedures may vary depending on specific lounge used. https://t.co/VXXFg8aIng

✨At the lounge counter, you will see signs as a reminder for social distancing. Plexiglass shields are also installed to keep a safe barrier with our colleagues.
⠀ https://t.co/6Q2jqETwbt

[Korean Air cares about your stay at our lounges.]
⠀
🧹For your safety and comfort, our lounges are disinfected several times a day.
When entering the lounge, please follow the queue stickers on the floor and make sure that you are wearing a face mask. https://t.co/HJlRtoiEGd

data.text:
@goomgang introduces his/her own secret corona clean destination.

#Himalayas Mt.

Did you know that there are various sceneries in the Himalayas?

How about enjoying a cup of coffee under the blue sky?

#KoreanAir #koreanairtrip https://t.co/AG2p8PsjWX

Despite the uncertainty about when to start flying back again, Korean Air’s maintenance technicians, 
went the extra mile by converting the passenger aircrafts to cargo flights. 

#KoreanAirMaintenance #PassengerAircraft_to_Cargo #B777 #KoreanAir

https://t.co/X5fMqny6z8

Listen to the lyrical song played by 
the sea breeze and the splashing wave,
at the heart of Ulsan’s Seul island🌊

The melody sounds like the song played by 
Geomungo, Korean traditional instrument🎵

Find more in Korean Air’s ___blank.
🎧https://t.co/4RqF8iRAhk https://t.co/GOwvCQoH5k

[Notification📢] Passengers who refuse to wear a mask will be denied boarding on Korean Air flights

For the safety of passengers and staff, please wear a mask or a face shield during check-in procedures, boarding, and in flight😊

To find more, visit ★https://t.co/gH4TIdeubM★ https://t.co/j7E5ShEkXG

🎧Turn up the volume before watching the video🎧

Listen to the fresh, energetic water sound of the waterfall 
from Mount Bukhan. 

Find more in Korean Air’s ___blank.
🎧https://t.co/D61nzPKsWw

#KoreanAir #ASMR #Blank #goKorean
#Seoul_Bukhansan_Valley https://t.co/LSUitBnFK5

#KoreanAir #ASMR #Blank #goKorean
#Damyang_Jungnogwon_Bamboo_Garden https://t.co/RWuRvXvKEn

Care First, Travel safely with us!✈️

We believe your health should come first before anything else🙏 We will put all our effort with strengthened disinfection measures, bringing you excellence in flight and safety.

#KoreanAir #CareFirst #대한항공

⠀

We hope to welcome you soon! 💙

#StaySafe #FlySoon #KoreanAir #COBI

data.text:
Korean Air has entered the "Top 10 Airlines in the World" as we were awarded by the 2020 Tripadvisor Travelers’ Choice Awards 👏
⠀
We appreciate the support of all our customers! We will continue our efforts to provide excellent customer service ✈️💙
⠀
#Tripadvisor #KoreanAir https://t.co/5JavyoGC4V

Feel the peaceful morning air of Jeju, gently mesmerizing
over you 

Find more in Korean Air’s ___blank.
🎧https://t.co/wUy2AQPXtn

#KoreanAir #ASMR #Blank #goKorean
#Sunrise_from_Yongnuni_Oreum_Jeju https://t.co/YwOFmvL9Ts

Listen to the elegant sound of raindrops dripping down the rooftop of Hanok, Korea’s traditional housing.
⠀
Find more in Korean Air’s ___blank.
⠀
🎧https://t.co/hrqP09ZOOS
⠀
#KoreanAir #ASMR #Blank #goKorean
#Bukchon_Hanok_Village https://t.co/IHSZuCwgqu

In Korea, today is ‘Chobok’ which refers to the first day of the year’s hottest season in the traditional Korean calendar 🌞
⠀
On this day, Koreans eat ‘Samgyetang’ to get over the hot summer and boost up their energy 💪
you must try 'Samgyetang' for sure 😉
⠀
#KoreanAir
⠀ https://t.co/ATW20CV1gA

Listen to the peaceful sound of nature, blended with the singing of the sheep. 

Find more in Korean Air’s ___blank.
🎧https://t.co/5WLQNn3NKA 

#KoreanAir #ASMR #Blank #goKorean
#Daegwallyeong_Sheep_Farm https://t.co/8m7GJkblAT

July 7th in the Lunar Calendar
In Korea, we call this day, ‘Chilseok’.

On this day, lovers who have been parted for a year meet again on top of the bridge.

Korean Air wishes to be this bridge that connects people, place, and time✈

#KoreanAir #Korea #July #Chilseok https://t.co/ht615IUI16

Expansion of “Notification Service of Baggage Loading”

From July 6 2020, The baggage loading service will be expanded to the passengers who depart from foreign airports (6 airports in AME)

Before boarding, find out the status of your baggage load by checking the notice message. https://t.co/lu2lW2KN7x

data.text:
With the hope of a safer, cleaner place, and with the wish to meet again our colleagues and customers,
We send our heart with sincerity in every touch of our hands.

★https://t.co/rgzWICjMNv (Korean Air Youtube)

#KoreanAir #Disinfection #SafeJourney #StaySafe #StayStrong https://t.co/fzAEhEFldl

Korean Air comes together to guarantee your safe journey✈

We will continue to enhance health and safety measures to protect our customers and employees😊

#KoreanAir #Disinfection🧴 #SafeJourney #StaySafe #StayStrong https://t.co/bC01YJJ3P5

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text:
[NEWS] Korean Air Extends Validity of Miles

For our customers who face challenge using the mileage due to COVID-19, Korean Air decided to extend the validity date of mileage expiring at the end of 2020.

★https://t.co/UvTZWezok9 

#KoreanAir #Mileage #MileageExtension #SKYPASS https://t.co/9Xpz8zFCm0

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: Thank you to @NongshimAmerica, @MitchOFarrell, @KYCCLA and @ACOForg for joining in delivering a variety of food, snacks and water in Council District 13 during the COVID-19 pandemic to the vulnerable in Los Angeles. #KoreanAirCares #WeAreInThisTogether #StaySafe #StayStrong https://t.co/TxI0lc03o5

During hard times like these, we need to smile more often😄

No matter where you are, we promise to deliver your cargos with speed, safety, and smiles ✈️

Let us help you to deliver your happiness throughout the world❤️

#KoreanAirCargo #KECargo #FastCargo https://t.co/cGOUhZDaGR

Korean Air is eagerly preparing for the day to welcome you all on board 🙏
⠀
With hope and pride, our employees from all around the world 🌍 wish for the day when we can "Fly again, Fly Together" ✈
⠀
#KoreanAir #FlyagainFlytogether #FlySoon https://t.co/rggBF2DvFV

data.text:
Starting from June 1, Skypass members can receive notifications from Korean Air's mobile app when their checked baggage has been safely loaded on their flights.
⠀
This system is available for all international flights departing Incheon International Airport💙
⠀
#KoreanAir 
⠀ https://t.co/EeH5xyWYX1

data.text:
📣 From today, all passengers must wear masks (or face coverings) on all flights during the whole travel.
⠀
If you are on your way to the airport🛫, please don't forget your mask to protect yourself from COVID-19 💙
⠀
#SafeTrip #KoreanAir #WearMask https://t.co/EkUP748LOf

The safety of our customers and employees is our first priority🙏
We take every measures to ensure our planes are fully sanitized and serviced to provide our passengers with ultimate comfort and confidence while flying✈
⠀
Stay Safe, Stay Healthy everyone!👍
⠀
#KoreanAir https://t.co/LfB4kqk8vI

Listen to the vibrant sound of Korea’s waterfall🌊
Find more in Korean Air’s ____blank.
▶ https://t.co/1rHxUtOJkl

#KoreanAir #ASMR #Blank #GoKorean https://t.co/ya9GKfauhu

data.text:
Here we got a message💌
from Korean Air employees.

"Stay strong, aviation colleagues.
As birds sometimes rest🕊,
this time will make us stronger.
We will Fly Again!
Let's meet at the Sky!"

thanks to @youngkalnori

#KoreanAir #IATA #WeAreAviation #WeWillFlyaAain✈ https://t.co/VISFwDkqyU

Wishing you a
Spring🌸
as Beautiful as
You are.

#KoreanAir✈ #Spring https://t.co/1rGhpPqarS

Korean Air has won the Diamond Award in the cargo airline category of the 2020 Air Cargo Excellence Awards organized by Air Cargo World.
#KoreanAir✈ #2020_Air_Cargo_Excellence_Awards🏆 https://t.co/itLf6vT6oL

data.text:
Although it's the perfect time to embrace the spring outside with our loved ones, most of us are staying indoors. 

On the other hand, the COVID-19 helps us to appreciate and respect the nature🌿more than ever.

Happy World Earth Day!
#EarthDay2020 #WorldEarthDay #KoreanAir https://t.co/v8V4Ki4FQV

data.text:
We would like to say thank you and honor all professionals in health care for their dedication and contributions to society as they stand in the front line of our defenses against global pandemic.

#FightCorona #KoreanAir #WorldHealthDay https://t.co/JGhs1N75d0

Please visit the link below to find out the countermeasures we are taking for your safe trip and FAQs for COVID-19.
(Page available with language set in English only)
🖥 PC https://t.co/r7xHNRu0yC
📱 Mobile https://t.co/eobRtdIeVJ

data.text: In order to prevent the spread of COVID-19, Korean Air is following all announced government measures. We have organized emergency response teams for aircraft transportations, cabins, and cabin medical safety to respond to any emergencies as quickly as possible.

data.text: Due to COVID-19, temperature checks of all international flights will be conducted at ICN International Airport. Also, the cabin of flights departing to the US and those arriving from China gets disinfected with MD-125. Korean Air will continue to prevent the spread of COVID-19. https://t.co/ILbork78UC

<Korean Air Launches New Direct Service to Budapest🎉>
Starting from May 23, 2020, #KoreanAir will commence the new scheduled passenger flight between Incheon (Seoul) and #Budapest🇭🇺 (#KE971, A330-200) three times a week (Tuesday, Thursday and Saturday)✈ https://t.co/ZbP2yVJj6B

Seoul’s #Donuimun_Gate may no longer be around, but its rich history still lives on at Donuimun Musuem Village, a nostalgic repository of Seoul’s modern history🇰🇷 Discover more about about charming #Domuinun here: https://t.co/O7N35GC1Aa
#goKorean #KoreanAir✈ https://t.co/HE3JQNmrBd

#KoreanAir is taking proactive measures in every sector to ensure the safety of passengers, as the number of the new #coronavirus cases quickly rises in China. Korean Air has also suspended its flights between Incheon and #Wuhan from January 24 to March 27✈ https://t.co/VsNSu8H8jr

[Happy Lunar New Year🎉]

Korean Air wishes you a Happy Korean Lunar New Year!🤩

Celebrate the Year of the Rat with your most precious people🐭🐹

If you are flying with us for the holiday trip, we will see you soon!✈️✈️
⠀
#LunarNewYear #KoreanAir #GoKorean https://t.co/8ZZusQocjP

[🎉World’s 9th most punctual airline✈️]

Korean Air has been ranked the world’s ninth most punctual mainline airline in the 2019 On-Time Performance (OTP) Review released by travel data and analytics expert Cirium! 😍😍

#KoreanAir #MostPunctualairline #OntimePerformance https://t.co/4xEVV359N3

data.text: Korea has 14 #UNESCO🌟 Heritage sites, and #Andong_Hahoe_Folk_Village🏠 is one of them. Just a quick day trip from Seoul, this is one of the most charming and historically rich villages in all of Korea. It’s also famous for its #traditional_Korean_mask☺ performances. #KoreanAir https://t.co/VzQGBHu8Vi

data.text:
#Sweetpotatoes🍠 are a Thanksgiving staple - they come mashed, made into soup, candied and souffleed. But in Korea, sweet potatoes are popular all year round. You’ll find sweet potato chips, ice cream, milk, lattes and even on pizza🍕
#goKorean #KoreanAir✈ https://t.co/J77tpBcbPI

In Korea, #walnuts play a key role in lots of dishes🍽 From being sprinkled on top of bibimbap and mixed with Korean condiments to make different side dishes, Koreans are wild over walnuts😋 See all the delicious things you can make with walnuts: https://t.co/ABktyGMmv7 https://t.co/eglsjvlJKa

data.text:
[Cover Dance Challenge Winners’ Announcement🎉]

#LetsGoEverywhere with Korean Air!
Who will be the lucky winners of roundtrip tickets?
★https://t.co/mbEN4NQgN9 (PC Only)

Check out the other amazing dance videos😋
★https://t.co/OpIPX2HvYa

#대한항공 #슈퍼엠 #KoreanAir #SuperM https://t.co/GMdMwPt5wN

Have an upcoming flight with #KoreanAir✈ and haven’t booked your seats yet? Don't worry. Passengers with eligible tickets can book seats as early as 361 days and as late as 24 hours before departure. Find out more about our #AdvancedSeatSelection😎 here: https://t.co/7l4RkMPp72 https://t.co/8UvdTvRHNM

#Bucheon Art Bunker #B39🏠 used to be a dark and gloomy garbage incinerator, but it’s been infused with creativity and life, turning it into a magnificent space that’s overflowing with culture and art🎨 Find out more about what you can discover here: https://t.co/fJ6cIGVQXZ https://t.co/0UMCCEmaDd

data.text:
Sweet #persimmons🍊 are the fruit of a Korean winter and can be found in all types of Korean dishes, from sweet rice cakes to dried snacks and teas. Get a taste of other ways Koreans cook sweet persimmons: https://t.co/9nvEDVOxMp
#KoreanAir✈ #goKorean https://t.co/fOmjGkHDno

data.text: Treat yourself to some retail therapy! Browse and pre-order duty free goods online before your flight or pop into our #SKYSHOP on board🎁 You can even send a loved one a gift with a special message. Find out more about our in-flight #shopping options: https://t.co/SnOKfGHJBo https://t.co/8TQPqhxEO3
